item.title: TikTok 寻求暂停美国禁令，等待最高法院审查
item.description: TikTok 要求暂缓执行美国法律强制中国母公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）出售或禁止该应用的规定，以便美国最高法院有机会进行审查。【原文：TikTok asked that a US law forcing a sale or ban of the app by China-based parent company ByteDance Ltd. be put on hold to give the US Supreme Court a chance to review.】

item.title: ASML 前员工被控向俄罗斯出售芯片商业机密
item.description: 荷兰政府指控 ASML Holding NV 的一名前雇员向俄罗斯公司出售芯片设备制造商的商业机密。【原文：The Dutch government accused a former ASML Holding NV employee of selling the chip equipment manufacturer’s trade secrets to Russian companies.】

item.title: 萨克斯店老板哈德逊湾为内曼交易出售垃圾债券
item.description: 奢侈品零售商萨克斯第五大道公司（Saks Fifth Avenue Inc.【原文：Hudson’s Bay Co., the owner of luxury retailer Saks Fifth Avenue Inc., is tapping the junk-bond market to help finance its acquisition of Neiman Marcus Group.】

item.title: 工人放弃机场，叙利亚失去剩余航空连接
item.description: 巴沙尔-阿萨德政权垮台后，叙利亚的主要机场暂停运营，过去十年中维持低水平国际连通性的仅剩的几个航班也停飞了。【原文：Syria’s main airports suspended operations following the collapse of Bashar Al-Assad’s regime, halting the few remaining flights that had maintained a low level of international connectivity in the past decade.】

item.title: 企业借比特币浪潮从可转换债务中融资数十亿美元
item.description: 由于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）选择了一位对加密货币友好的金融家担任美国最高金融监管机构的负责人，加密货币的反弹让该行业的一些公司成为赢家，这些公司效仿微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：A rally across cryptocurrencies has made winners out of a handful of firms in the sector that followed MicroStrategy Inc.’s playbook of selling convertible bonds, thanks to President-elect Donald Trump choosing a crypto-friendly financier to head the top US financial regulator.】

item.title: 意大利燃料储存场爆炸致两名工人死亡
item.description: 欧洲最大的燃料供应商之一埃尼公司（Eni SpA）位于意大利北部的一个运输燃料储存设施周一发生爆炸。【原文：An explosion occurred Monday at a storage facility for transport fuels in northern Italy owned by Eni SpA, one of Europe’s biggest fuel suppliers.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 研究员创办的人工智能语音创业公司估值 2 亿美元
item.description:
WaveForms 希望帮助人们与机器进行更好的口语对话。【原文：

WaveForms wants to help people have better spoken conversations with machines. 

】

item.title: 太阳能公司获得 8.47 亿美元的电池板订单，并希望再获得 10 亿美元的订单
item.description: 太阳能景观有限责任公司（Solar Landscape LLC）是一家屋顶开发商，该公司表示在 2024 年筹集了 8.47 亿美元，明年将再寻求 10 亿美元的资金，用于在商业和工业建筑上安装太阳能电池板。【原文：Solar Landscape LLC, a rooftop developer that said it raised $847 million in 2024, is seeking an additional $1 billion next year to finance the installation of panels on commercial and industrial buildings.】

item.title: Reddit 将推出人工智能聊天机器人，抵御搜索引擎的攻击
item.description: Reddit 公司正在测试一款新的人工智能聊天机器人，这家社交媒体公司正在寻找增加用户互动和留住用户的方法。【原文：Reddit Inc. is testing a new AI-powered chatbot as the social media company looks for ways to increase user interactions and keep people on its site.】

item.title: 南非政府不会与麦肯锡就 2025 年二十国集团峰会开展合作
item.description: 即使在这家全球咨询公司同意支付超过 1.22 亿美元以解决与该国腐败丑闻有关的刑事指控之后，南非政府仍不会与麦肯锡公司就明年的 20 国集团会议开展合作。【原文：South Africa’s government won’t work with McKinsey & Co. on next year’s Group of 20 gatherings even after the global consulting firm agreed to pay more than $122 million to resolve criminal allegations tied to a corruption scandal in the country.】

item.title: 大胆买入黎巴嫩债券，丹斯克基金经理获得回报
item.description: 黎巴嫩违约的美元债券在不到三个月的时间里几乎翻了一番，一位从一开始就捕捉到这一暴涨的交易商说，在叙利亚长期独裁者巴沙尔-阿萨德被推翻后，这些债券可能会再次翻番。【原文：Lebanon’s defaulted dollar bonds have almost doubled in less than three months, and one trader who caught the surge from the beginning says they could double again after the overthrow of longtime Syrian dictator Bashar Al-Assad.】

item.title: Novolex Holdings 将收购包装业竞争对手 Pactiv Evergreen
item.description: Novolex 表示将以每股 18 美元的价格收购竞争对手包装制造商 Pactiv Evergreen Inc.【原文：Novolex said it will purchase rival packaging maker Pactiv Evergreen Inc. for $18 a share, or $6.7 billion including debt.】

item.title: 捷克总理称欧洲需要美国向普京展示实力
item.description: 捷克共和国总理警告盟国不要在结束乌克兰战争的任何进程中采取 "绥靖 "态度，他说，欧洲需要美国展示实力，以阻止俄罗斯采取更多侵略性行动。【原文：Europe will need the US to project strength to halt more aggressive moves from Russia, the Czech Republic’s prime minister said, as he warned allies against “appeasement” in any process to end the war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 微策略公司买入更多比特币，资金来源引关注
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. bought another $2.1 billion in Bitcoin while its combination of equity and fixed-income securities sales to finance the rapidly increasing acquisitions draws increased scrutiny.】

item.title: 新日铁澄清支出承诺以挽救美国协议
item.description: 新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.）澄清了其在美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. clarified its spending plans at US mills owned by United States Steel Corp. as part of last-ditch efforts to win over workers and politicians for its bid to buy the Pittsburgh-based steelmaker.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 Dimension 融资 5 亿美元，押注人工智能和医疗领域
item.description:
公司表示，技术进步将预示着健康科学的 "世代交替"。【原文：

Tech advancements will herald “generational shift” in health science, firm says. 

】

item.title: 终极格斗锦标赛选择每日电讯报的 "Woke-Free "剃须刀品牌作为官方合作伙伴
item.description:
此次合作表明，这家综合格斗公司与保守派政治家和播客的文化契合度越来越高

。【原文：

The partnership illustrates the mixed-martial-arts company’s growing cultural alignment with conservative politicians and podcasters

】

item.title: 维塔士、StanChart 加入新的英国加密衍生品交易平台
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）和维塔金融公司（Virtu Financial Inc.【原文：Standard Chartered Plc and Virtu Financial Inc. are among large financial companies poised to join a new London-based crypto derivatives venue, as a market rally boosts the appeal of digital currencies.】

item.title: 西非作物前景恶化，可可创 7 个月新高
item.description: 可可期货创下七个多月来的最高水平，因为西非的生产前景暗淡，在库存处于历史低位的情况下威胁着全球供应。【原文：Cocoa futures hit the highest level in over seven months as West Africa’s production prospects dim, threatening global supplies at a time of historically low inventories.】

item.title: 以色列的斯莫特里奇说特朗普提供了推翻伊朗的机会
item.description: 以色列财政部长兼内部安全内阁成员贝扎莱尔-斯莫特里奇（Bezalel Smotrich）说，唐纳德-特朗普下个月的就职典礼为以色列提供了一个实现几个战略目标的机会：推翻伊朗政府、阻止巴勒斯坦建国、阻止黎巴嫩沿以色列边境重建村庄。【原文：Bezalel Smotrich, Israel’s finance minister and inner security cabinet member, said the inauguration of Donald Trump next month offers Israel a chance to pursue several strategic goals: overthrow the government of Iran, prevent the establishment of a Palestinian state, and stop the rebuilding of Lebanese villages along Israel’s border.】

item.title: 巴里克首席执行官被逮捕，马里提高了黄金矿商的风险
item.description:
在收入纠纷问题上，军政权正在对一些行业内最大的 名字发起攻击。【原文：

The military regime is going after some of the industry’s biggest names in disputes over revenues.

】

item.title: 宏盟集团将收购 Interpublic，打造最大广告公司
item.description: 宏盟集团（Omnicom Group Inc.【原文：Omnicom Group Inc. has agreed to buy Interpublic Group in a deal that will create the largest advertising company in the world.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行第二次为 SRT 提供支持，支持 170 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）第二次增加了与重大风险转移相关的企业贷款组合规模，这是投资者对此类交易的需求不断增长的最新迹象。【原文：BNP Paribas SA increased the size of a corporate loan portfolio linked to a significant risk transfer for a second time, according to people familiar with the matter, providing the latest sign of growing investor demand for these transactions.】

item.title: 私人信贷先锋的挣扎是市场的警示信号
item.description:
Alcentra曾经是欧洲直接借贷行业的领导者。它现在发现很难为这项业务筹集到新资金。【原文：

Alcentra was once a leader in European direct lending. It’s now finding it hard to raise new money for that business. 

】

item.title: 中国总理誓言竭尽全力扩大需求
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强承诺，中国政府将尽一切可能促进国内消费，以支持中国的经济增长。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang pledged Beijing will do everything possible to boost domestic consumption in an effort to support the country’s economic growth.】

item.title: 波兰央行行长预计总统大选后将降息
item.description: 波兰政策制定者普热米斯瓦夫-利特维纽克（Przemyslaw Litwiniuk）表示，随着央行与执政党之间紧张关系的重现，波兰可能会在 7 月总统大选后降息。【原文：Poland may cut interest rates in July following a presidential election, policymaker Przemyslaw Litwiniuk said as tensions between the central bank and the ruling party resurface.】

item.title: 墨西哥降息在即，通胀放缓略低于预期
item.description: 墨西哥 11 月份总体通胀率的放缓幅度略高于预期，这增加了墨西哥央行在下周会议上连续第四次降息的可能性。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation slowed slightly more than expected in November, boosting the odds of a fourth straight interest rate cut at the central bank’s meeting next week.】

item.title: OpenAI 以 200 美元的 ChatGPT 计划测试人工智能热情的极限
item.description: OpenAI 希望回答我们到底愿意为最好的人工智能工具支付多少钱。但首先...【原文：OpenAI is looking to answer exactly how much we’re all willing to pay for the best artificial intelligence tools around. But first...】

item.title: 民调显示：英国贸易观点倾向欧盟而非美国
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，英国人希望政府优先考虑与欧盟而非美国的贸易，因为英国正准备审查其英国脱欧协议，同时面临美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战的威胁。【原文：Britons want their government to prioritize trade with the European Union over the US, according to a poll, as the UK prepares to review its Brexit deal while facing the threat of a trade war from President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 《侠盗猎车手 6》将在 2025 年统治电子游戏产业
item.description:
人们对十多年来第一部GTA的期望高得危险。【原文：

Expectations are dangerously high for the first GTA in more than a decade.

】
